part.name: P2
part.heading: Definition of Prescribed Products

def.name: RoomAirConditioner
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, room air conditioner (空調機), subject to section 2, means a product— (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: that is an encased assembly or encased assemblies that are designed to be used together where— (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the assembly or assemblies is or are designed primarily to provide free delivery of conditioned air to an enclosed space, room or zone (conditioned space); and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the assembly or assemblies has or have a prime source of refrigeration for cooling or heating; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: that is of single package type or split type, and—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source;
operates by using the vapour compression cycle;
is non-ducted;
is air-cooled or air-heated (or both);
is of either cooling only type or reverse cycle type; and
has a rated cooling capacity not exceeding 7.5 kilowatts. (Replaced L.N. 4 of 2018)

def.name: RoomAirConditioner
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, room air conditioner (空調機) does not include air-conditioners that are—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: fan-coil air-conditioning units;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: water-cooled units;

paragraph.name: ba
paragraph.content: water-heated units; (Added L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: multiple split-system air conditioners;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: heat pumps for heating only;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: units designed for use with additional ducting or flexible pipes for air intake or exhaust; or

paragraph.name: f
paragraph.content: ceiling-mounted type or floor standing type air conditioners.

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In sections 1 and 2—
section.def: air-cooled (氣冷式), in relation to a room air conditioner, means the employment of air-cooled condensers in the room air conditioner;
air-heated (氣暖式), in relation to a room air conditioner, means the employment of air-heated evaporators in the room air conditioner; (Added L.N. 4 of 2018)
cooling capacity (製冷量) means the amount of sensible and latent heat that a room air conditioner can remove from the conditioned space in a defined interval of time;

fan-coil air-conditioning unit (盤管式空調機組) means an air-conditioning unit equipped with a fan re-circulating air from the conditioned space through the coil, that contains either chilled or hot water for cooling or heating;
heat pump (熱泵) means an encased assembly or assemblies designed as a unit to provide delivery of heat, which includes an electrically operated refrigeration system for heating;
mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;

def.name: MultipleSplitsystem
def.leadIn: multiple split-system (多重分體式系統) means a split system that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: incorporates a single or multiple refrigerant circuits;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has one or more compressors;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: has multiple indoor units;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: has one or more outdoor units; and

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: is capable of operating either as an air conditioner or a heat pump;

section.def: rated cooling capacity (額定製冷量) means the cooling capacity of a room air conditioner as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the room air conditioner in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice;

vapour compression cycle (蒸氣壓縮循環方式) means a mechanism employed by a room air conditioner throughout which the refrigerant undergoes alternate compression and expansion to achieve the cooling or heating function;
water-cooled (水冷式), in relation to a room air conditioner, means the employment of water-cooled condensers in the room air conditioner; (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)
water-heated (水暖式), in relation to a room air conditioner, means the employment of water-heated evaporators in the room air conditioner. (Added L.N. 4 of 2018)

section.name: s4
section.content: In section 1(b), a room air conditioner is of single package type if it is a room air conditioner which consists of components of a refrigeration system fixed on a common mounting to form a discrete unit.

section.name: s5
section.content: In section 1(b), a room air conditioner is of split type if it is a room air conditioner which has separate indoor and outdoor components that are connected with the refrigerant piping, and the indoor unit of which usually lies within the conditioned space.

section.name: s6
section.content: In section 1(b)(v), a room air conditioner is of cooling only type if it is a room air conditioner which is used for cooling, but not for heating.

section.name: s7
section.content: In section 1(b)(v), a room air conditioner is of reverse cycle type if it is a room air conditioner which can operate in normal or reverse vapour compression cycle, used for both cooling and heating.

section.name: s8
section.leadIn: In section 2(f), a room air conditioner is of ceiling-mounted type if it is a split type room air conditioner whose indoor unit—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is equipped with mounting brackets or hooks on its body at appropriate locations;

paragraph.name: b
c
paragraph.content: is intended to be installed directly under the ceiling; and

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: has an intake grille, which may or may not be installed at the same level as the adjacent false ceiling panels (if there are such false ceiling panels).

section.name: s9
section.leadIn: In section 2(f), a room air conditioner is of floor standing type if it is a split type room air conditioner whose indoor unit is intended to be installed directly on the floor in accordance with the manufacturer’s installation procedures.

def.name: RefrigeratingAppliance
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, refrigerating appliance (冷凍器具), subject to section 2, means a product— (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: that is a factory-assembled insulated cabinet with one or more compartments and of suitable volume and equipment for household use, cooled by internal natural convection or a frost-free system where the cooling is obtained by one or more energy-consuming means; (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: that is a refrigerator, frozen food storage cabinet or food freezer (or a combination of any of them); and (Replaced L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: that—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source;
operates by using the vapour compression cycle; and
has a rated total storage volume not exceeding 500 litres. (Replaced L.N. 4 of 2018)

section.name: s2
section.def: In this Schedule, refrigerating appliance (冷凍器具) does not include appliances that operate by using absorption refrigerating system. (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In sections 1 and 2—

def.name: AbsorptionRefrigeratingSystem
def.leadIn: absorption refrigerating system (吸收式製冷系統) means a system—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: by which refrigeration effect is produced through the use of two fluids and some quantity of heat input; and

paragraph.name: b

section.def: mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;

rated total storage volume (額定總容積) means the total storage volume of a refrigerating appliance as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the refrigerating appliance in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice;

vapour compression cycle (蒸氣壓縮循環方式) means a mechanism employed by a refrigerating appliance throughout which the refrigerant undergoes alternate compression and expansion to achieve the cooling or heating function.

def.name: CompactFluorescentLamp
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, compact fluorescent lamp (緊湊型熒光燈), subject to section 2, means a product— (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: that is a type of fluorescent lamp which has a single lamp cap; and (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: that is of integrated type, and—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source;
has a rated lamp wattage up to 60 watts; and
has a screw or bayonet cap. (Replaced L.N. 4 of 2018)

def.name: CompactFluorescentLamp
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, compact fluorescent lamp (緊湊型熒光燈) does not include—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: non-integrated type compact fluorescent lamps;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: reflector compact fluorescent lamps; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: cold cathode fluorescent lamps.

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In sections 1 and 2—

def.name: ColdCathodeFluorescentLamp
def.leadIn: cold cathode fluorescent lamp (冷陰極熒光燈) means a lamp of a type whose principle of illumination is the same as that of a conventional fluorescent lamp except that it—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: does not require heating of electrodes during starting and operating; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: operates at a much higher voltage and lower current to start and maintain the discharge;

section.def: mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;
non-integrated type compact fluorescent lamp (非整合式熒光燈) means a compact fluorescent lamp of a type that is electrically connected to an external ballast for operation;

rated lamp wattage (額定瓦數值) means the wattage of a compact fluorescent lamp as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the compact fluorescent lamp in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice;

reflector compact fluorescent lamp (反射式熒光燈) means a compact fluorescent lamp of a type that comprises one or more compact fluorescent arc tubes mounted into a reflector housing for directing light from light source, both of which cannot be dismantled without being permanently damaged.

section.name: s4
section.leadIn: In section 1(b), a product is of integrated type if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: it is a single integrated assembly comprising a lamp cap, a light source and additional elements necessary for starting and for stable operation of the light source; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: it cannot be dismantled without being permanently damaged.

def.name: WashingMachine
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, washing machine (洗衣機), subject to section 2, means a product— (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: that is a household appliance for cleaning and rinsing of textiles using water with or without a means of extracting excess water from the textiles; and (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: that—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source; and
has a rated washing capacity not exceeding 10 kilograms,

paragraph.continued: whether or not having a built-in dryer for drying textiles by means of heating. (Replaced L.N. 4 of 2018)

section.name: s2
section.def: In this Schedule, washing machine (洗衣機) does not include washing machines that have no spin extraction capability. (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In section 1—
section.def: mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;

rated washing capacity (額定洗衣量) means the washing capacity of a washing machine as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the washing machine in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice.

def.name: Dehumidifier
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, dehumidifier (抽濕機), subject to section 2, means a product— (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: that is an encased assembly for removing moisture from its surrounding atmosphere; and (Amended L.N. 4 of 2018)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: that is self-contained, electrically operated and mechanically-refrigerated, and—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source;
operates by using the vapour compression cycle;

subparagraph.name: A
B
subparagraph.content: a refrigerating system, including an electric motor;

subparagraph.name: C
subparagraph.content: an air circulating fan; and

subparagraph.name: D
subparagraph.content: a drain system for collecting or disposing of the condensate; and
has a rated dehumidifying capacity not exceeding 35 litres per day. (Replaced L.N. 4 of 2018)

def.name: Dehumidifier
def.leadIn: In this Schedule, dehumidifier (抽濕機) does not include dehumidifiers that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: may also operate by using desiccant materials; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: are room air conditioners having dehumidifying function.

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In section 1—
section.def: mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;

rated dehumidifying capacity (額定抽濕量) means the dehumidifying capacity of a dehumidifier as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the dehumidifier in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice;

vapour compression cycle (蒸氣壓縮循環方式) means a mechanism employed by a dehumidifier throughout which the refrigerant undergoes alternate compression and expansion to achieve the cooling or heating function.

section.leadIn: In this Schedule—

section.name: s2

section.name: s3

rated visible diagonal screen size (額定可視屏幕對角尺寸) means the visible diagonal screen size as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the product in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice.

section.name: s1
section.leadIn: In this Schedule—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: that is a household appliance—

subparagraph.content: designed for heating water in a thermally well-insulated container and for the storage of heated water; and
having a device to control the water temperature; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: that—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source; and
has a rated water storage capacity not exceeding 50 litres.

section.name: s2
section.leadIn: In this Schedule—

def.name: StorageTypeElectricWaterHeater
def.leadIn: storage type electric water heater (儲水式電熱水器) does not include a product that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is designed for making hot drinks or food only; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has more than one heated volume.

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In section 1—
section.def: mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;

rated water storage capacity (額定儲水容量) means the water storage capacity as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the product in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice.

section.name: s1
section.leadIn: In this Schedule—

def.name: InductionCooker
def.leadIn: induction cooker (電磁爐), subject to section 2, means a product—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: that is an encased assembly using electromagnetic induction heating as the heat source for household cooking; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: that—

subparagraph.content: uses mains electricity as the only power source;

has a total rated power not exceeding 7 000 watts.

section.name: s2
section.leadIn: In this Schedule—

def.name: InductionCooker
def.leadIn: induction cooker (電磁爐) does not include a product that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: contains an electric heating unit not using electromagnetic induction heating as the heat source; or

paragraph.content: is a concave stove.

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: In this Division—
section.def: mains electricity (市電) means the electricity that is supplied in Hong Kong at a voltage of 380/220V and a frequency of 50 Hz;

rated power (額定功率) means the power of a heating unit when operating independently, as determined and declared by the manufacturer or importer of the product in accordance with the standard and requirements specified in the approved code of practice;

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.leadIn: that—

section.name: s1
section.leadIn: In this Schedule—

def.name: GasCooker
def.leadIn: gas cooker (氣體煮食爐)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: means a product—

subparagraph.content: that is a domestic gas appliance as defined by regulation 2 of the Gas Safety (Installation and Use) Regulations (Cap. 51 sub. leg. C);

section.name: s6
section.leadIn: The size of the energy label is to be chosen in accordance with the following criteria—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: the size specified in section 2 of this Part (largest label size) is to be chosen if all the requirements in paragraph (a) (paragraph (a) requirements) can be complied with by choosing that size;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: if the paragraph (a) requirements cannot be complied with by choosing the largest label size, then the largest of the following sizes that complies with the paragraph (a) requirements is to be chosen—

subparagraph.content: 90% of the largest label size;
80% of the largest label size;
70% of the largest label size;
60% of the largest label size;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: if a size smaller than the largest label size is chosen in accordance with paragraph (c), sections 2 and 4 of this Part have effect as if the dimensions specified in that section 2 and the font size specified in that section 4 were adjusted proportionately;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: if the product packaging is so small that choosing a size of 60% of the largest label size would not comply with the paragraph (a) requirements, the specified person in respect of the product is to apply for the Director’s directions on the manner of displaying the energy label on the packaging.
